opendb_id.description: Unique identifier for the document (UUID v4)

wattage.description: The total power output of the PSU in watts (e.g., 1000)

form_factor.description: The physical size and shape of the PSU (e.g., ATX)

efficiency_rating.description: The 80 PLUS efficiency certification level (e.g., 80 PLUS Gold)

modular.description: The modularity of the PSU cables (e.g., Full, Semi-Modular, Non-Modular)

color.description: The color of this product (e.g., ['Black', 'Red']). Each color of the product should be included in the array.

length.description: The length of the PSU in mm (e.g., 140)

fanless.description: Whether the PSU operates without a fan

atx_24_pin.description: The number of ATX 24-pin (20+4) connectors (main motherboard power)

eps_8_pin.description: The number of EPS12V 8-pin (4+4) connectors (CPU power)

pcie_12vhpwr.description: The number of PCIe 5.0 12VHPWR (12+4) pin connectors (for high-end GPUs). Also referred to as 16-pin (12+4)

pcie_6_plus_2_pin.description: The number of PCIe 6+2-pin connectors (commonly used for GPUs)

sata.description: The number of SATA power connectors

molex_4_pin.description: The number of Molex 4-pin peripheral connectors (for older devices)

floppy_4_pin.description: The number of Floppy 4-pin connectors. Increasingly rare

general_product_information.description: General product information and retailer SKUs
